blogs.title: Personal site progress
blogs.content: I'm enjoying experimenting with Bootstrap here, but I am really ready to move to single-page applications, if, as it's been implied, that means we can refactor our structural HTML (separate out headers and footers).

blogs.title: Company site redo
blogs.content: I'm looking forward to redoing this projects, especially if we can do it as a SPA. Not that I'm 100% sure what that means at this point.

blogs.title: Git shaming
blogs.content: I was thoroughly and rightly shamed yesterday for reviewing and merging my own pull requests.
